events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund or an exchange as soon as possible.
Case categorized under refund since customer is requesting money back or exchange for wrong size item.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund request for the incorrect jacket size delivery.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket size. I'm here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket showing the size label so we can verify your request?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and attached is a photo of the jacket with the size L label visible as requested.
Thank you for the information. We can issue a full refund once the jacket is returned, or we can send you the correct size right away at no extra cost.
I would prefer the exchange option, please send the correct size as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick response!
We have processed your exchange request and the correct size jacket will be shipped within 2 business days with free return packaging for the incorrect item.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the correct jacket size and that everything is satisfactory now.
Closing your case as we have confirmed the exchange was completed successfully. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
